thread.title: Mila Kunis Is Producing a Sitcom for NBC
thread.title_full: Mila Kunis Is Producing a Sitcom for NBC | Maxim

author: Ellen Killoran
title: Mila Kunis Is Producing a Sitcom for NBC
text:
Mila Kunis's production company Orchard Farm Productions has inked a development deal with NBC for a single-camera comedy about a husband who must adjust after his Russian in-laws move upstairs.
According to a Deadline report, The Russians Are Coming is "semi-autobiographical," but it's unclear whose real-life story is the source material. Kunis was born in Ukraine in 1983 and lived there for the first seven years of her life, when it was part of the Soviet Union. She moved to the U.S. as a child without knowing a word of English. The series will be written and co-executive produced by Sam Wolfson ( Finding Carter , Jewtopia ).
In the meantime, here's Mila giving a reporter a dressing down in Russian after she asked Justin Timberlake a rude question at a press conference to promote Friends With Benefits :
